column5: This 3-story direct beach front house has a 3/4 acre yard backing up to the ocean. You can't beat this view! Every bedroom in the main house opens up to a huge deck overlooking the Gulf, you can fall asleep listening to the waves. Plus, we have a beautiful studio apartment on the bottom floor that will sleep up to 4. Enjoy the sunrise on one of the two huge back decks and see the sunset from the front deck. The secluded bottom patio provides a private seating area, grill, and outdoor shower.
column8: Beachfront, Baby! Stunning Port A views
